content.body: {"theme":{"id":"theme","version":"1.0","startStage":"ec39099a-ea1c-4322-b5d6-c3c59352ae44","stage":[{"x":0,"y":0,"w":100,"h":100,"id":"ec39099a-ea1c-4322-b5d6-c3c59352ae44","rotate":null,"config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"color\":\"#FFFFFF\",\"genieControls\":false,\"instructions\":\"\"}"},"manifest":{"media":[]},"org.ekstep.text":[{"x":12.5,"y":23.46,"minWidth":20,"w":67.6,"maxWidth":500,"fill":"#000000","fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"normal","stroke":"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)","strokeWidth":1,"opacity":1,"editable":false,"version":"V2","offsetY":0.04,"h":45.2,"rotate":0,"textType":"text","lineHeight":1,"z-index":0,"font":"NotoSans","fontsize":48,"weight":"","id":"5eb50904-e399-4eb6-ba55-ea594ebc0330","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"Lily is a feminine given name directly derived from lily, the flower. The popularity of the name increased steadily in most English-speaking countries during the late 20th century.[1] In the United States, \\\"Lily\\\" became one of the top-100 names for newborn girls in 2002 and reached a rank of 18 by 2009.[2] In England in 2011, Lily was the 3rd most popular name for baby girls.[3] In Northern Ireland, \\\"Lily\\\" increased in rank by 90 places in 2003, reaching the top 100.[4]\",\"color\":\"#000000\",\"fontfamily\":\"NotoSans\",\"fontsize\":18,\"fontweight\":false,\"fontstyle\":false,\"align\":\"left\"}"}}]}],"manifest":{"media":[{"id":"d9066972-31e5-4940-b205-398e2b69349d","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/renderer/controller/navigation_ctrl.js","type":"js"},{"id":"db4724e3-54c8-4b3e-9a16-489caaa0e93e","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/renderer/templates/navigation.html","type":"js"},{"id":"org.ekstep.navigation","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/renderer/plugin.js","type":"plugin"},{"id":"org.ekstep.navigation_manifest","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/manifest.json","type":"json"},{"id":"org.ekstep.text","plugin":"org.ekstep.text","ver":"1.2","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.text-1.2/renderer/supertextplugin.js","type":"plugin"},{"id":"org.ekstep.text_manifest","plugin":"org.ekstep.text","ver":"1.2","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.text-1.2/manifest.json","type":"json"}]},"plugin-manifest":{"plugin":[{"id":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","type":"plugin","depends":""},{"id":"org.ekstep.text","ver":"1.2","type":"plugin","depends":""}]},"compatibilityVersion":2}}
